dcterms:creator: Chi-en Amy Tai
Matthew Keller
Mattie Kerrigan
Yuhao Chen
Saeejith Nair
Pengcheng Xi
Alexander Wong
dcterms:description: A large-scale synthetic food image dataset comprising 84,984 photorealistic meal images rendered from 7,082 dynamically composed 3D scenes, with perfect ground truth annotations including RGB, depth, semantic, instance, and amodal segmentation masks, bounding boxes, and detailed nutritional information per food item.
dcterms:title: NutritionVerse-Synth (NV-Synth)

dcterms:creator: Chi-en Amy Tai
Matthew Keller
Mattie Kerrigan
Yuhao Chen
Saeejith Nair
Pengcheng Xi
Alexander Wong
dcterms:description: A 3D food model dataset that provides high-quality 3D food assets used for generating synthetic food images in the NV-Synth dataset.
dcterms:title: NutritionVerse-3D

dcterms:creator: Quin Thames
Arjun Karpur
Wade Norris
Fangting Xia
Liviu Panait
Tobias Weyand
Jack Sim
dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at automatic nutritional understanding of generic food, providing a diverse set of food images and associated nutritional information.
dcterms:title: Nutrition5k

dcterms:creator: Yoshikazu Ando
Takumi Ege
Jaehyeong Cho
Keiji Yanai
dcterms:description: A mobile application dataset for volume-based food calorie estimation using depth cameras, providing depth images and associated calorie information.
dcterms:title: Depthcaloriecam
